aiPlanning.question: How does AI-powered trip planning work?
aiPlanning.answer: Our AI analyzes millions of data points including flight prices, hotel reviews, local attractions, and user preferences to create personalized itineraries. Simply describe your dream trip in natural language, and our AI will generate a complete travel plan with flights, hotels, activities, and local recommendations.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. For enterprise customers, we also offer invoicing options. All payments are processed securely through our trusted payment partners.

internationalDestinations.question: Do you work with international destinations?
internationalDestinations.answer: Yes, we cover over 200 countries worldwide with comprehensive travel information. Our AI provides local insights, cultural recommendations, and safety updates for international destinations. We also offer multi-language support for global travelers.

aiPlanner.question: How does the AI travel planner work?
aiPlanner.answer: Our AI travel planner uses advanced machine learning to understand your preferences, budget, and travel style. It analyzes real-time data from multiple sources to recommend the best flights, hotels, and activities. The more you use it, the better it learns your preferences.

dataSecurity.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecurity.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. All personal information is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your data with third parties without your consent. Our platform complies with international data protection regulations including GDPR.
